README:
# VideoDL

A modern, user-friendly video downloader application. Uses yt-dlp as the backend to batch-download videos.

Features: concurrent downloads (1-10), clean UI with status updates and logs, automatic yt-dlp updates, visual status tracking, and detailed logging.

Installation (summary): download the pre-built VideoDL.exe from Releases or build from source (clone repo, `pip install -r requirements.txt`, then `python main.py`).

Platforms: Windows (pre-built executable available), Linux and macOS (build from source).

Technical: Python 3.8+, PyQt6 UI, yt-dlp downloader, uses QThreadPool for concurrency.

Building (summary): example PyInstaller command provided in repo for creating the Windows executable.

Contributing and acknowledgments: contributions welcome; acknowledges yt-dlp and PyQt.
